metadata.title: CVE-2024-36619 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: FFmpeg n6.1.1 has a vulnerability in the WAVARC decoder of the libavcodeclibrary which allows for an integer overflow when handling certain blocktypes, leading to a denial-of-service (DoS) condition.

criterions.comment: ffmpeg package in oracular is affected and needs fixing.
